data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Papua Barat to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Papua Barat, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 674,711, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Papua Barat.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Papua Barat, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Ayamaru people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Ayamaru people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Papua Barat who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord we pray you unite the 24,397 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Papua Barat.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Papua Barat, Indonesia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Papua Barat
location.people_groups_list: Uruangnirin, Jahalatan, Geser-Gorom, Meoswar, Nuaulu, South
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Uruangnirin (500), Jahalatan (1,900), Geser-Gorom (37,000), Meoswar (400), Nuaulu, South (2,100)
